description:

So I wanted to put him with a dude that he could show no mercy with, and Beau is the guy to take on the challenge.
Maverick did great fucking him and was a bit surprised and how much he could take.
Maverick delivers an amazing load to Beau's face, mouth and chest, putting Beau instantly over the top. Another well-timed cumshot that you know happened 'cuz Beau is gulping down Maverick's load!
title: Beau & Maverick - Wrapped
